name: Rollcall
title: Android
summary: Rollcall is an Android app developed for university rollcall management, providing a variety of powerful features such as teacher administration, rapid operations, user-friendly design, and parameterized reporting capabilities.
explain:
Rollcall is an Android application designed for university teachers to manage attendance efficiently. It includes a range of powerful features such as teacher management, fast performance, an easy-to-use interface, customizable reports, and the ability to import and export data from Microsoft Excel.

Project feature:

- Manage teachers

- Mange rollcall

- Communicate with Microsoft Excel and SQLite database

- Exported data filter by rollcall and teachers

This program is currently used in Shomal university
